spec_data.Name: perl-Exporter-Easy
spec_data.Description:
Exporter::Easy makes using Exporter easy. In its simplest case, it allows
you to drop the boilerplate code that comes with using Exporter, so more
complicated situations where you use tags to build lists and more tags
become easy.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 13 Aug 2017 02:29:09 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Takes the drudgery out of Exporting symbols
